column2: UPDATE 1-Pfizer's Ibrance drug slows progression of breast cancer CHICAGO May 30 A Phase III trial of Pfizer Inc's  Ibrance showed that
column4: the drug more than doubled the duration of disease control for women with the most common type of breast cancer. ~Pfizer's Ibrance drug slows progression of breast cancer CHICAGO May 30 A Phase III trial of Pfizer Inc's  drug Ibrance showed that
column6: the drug more than doubled the duration of disease control for women with the most common type of breast cancer. ~
